item.description:
** PLEASE:  For those that have not done so, please tell everyone what your bringing.  If you don't know exactly, like me, at the very least put down whether its a Main dish or a dessert.  So we don't have 10 salads, etc.

 

I thought we could try something different.  Eat Healthy! LOL!

                                                                                                                                            Everyone Bring a Healthy Dish to share: Main Course ,Salad, Side, or Dessert.

3 Women Choose a Healthy Main Course   

2 Women Choose a Healthy Salad

3 Women Choose Healthy Side Dishes

2 Women Choose Healthy Desserts

IMPORTANT! WHEN YOU RESERVE PLEASE ADD A NOTE AS TO WHAT TYPE OF COURSE YOU ARE BRINGING AND WHAT IT IS SO IT WON'T BE REPEATED.

IF ALL THE MAIN COURSES ARE TAKEN, DO NOT PICK THIS, GO TO ANOTHER CATEGORY. THE SAME GOES FOR SALADS, SIDES AND DESSERTS. BYOB!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Healthy Pot Luck Dinner!
